messages.subject: FREE Trial to Project-based learning web site
messages.msgSnippet: Hi.  I m a homeschooling mom and do freelance marketing/PR work. I m currently doing a marketing job for an education web site called Project Power.  An
messages.messageBody:
Hi. I'm a homeschooling mom and do freelance marketing/PR work.
I'm currently doing a marketing job for an education web site called
Project Power. An innovative site devoted to enhancing learning
through hands-on projects, Project Power combines great projects
with convenient tools to assign and manage projects online.

Currently, the site is used by public schools, but it will soon be
opened to homeschoolers. I am helping them evaluate appropriate
pricing and changes to the web site to make it as friendly as
possible to homeschool users.

In that effort, I am seeking a group of 15 to 20 homeschoolers who
would like to try the site for free for 30 days and provide feedback
to the company at the end of their trial. (A 10-day trial is
available to any visitor).

You can peruse the site at www.projectpower.com. If you're
interested in participating in the trial and shaping the site for
the homeschool community, please e-mail me at
dmarinelli09@....

Thank you,

Diane Marinelli
